title: Businesses invited to sign up for Home and Garden show
title_page: Businesses invited to sign up for Home and Garden show
maintext:
Businesses invited to sign up for Home and Garden show
STERLING — Area home and garden businesses are invited to showcase their products and services and connect with customers at the Sauk Valley Home and Garden Show.
The show, sponsored by Sauk Valley Media, takes place from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. March 9 and 11 a.m. to 3 p.m. March 10 at Northland Mall in Sterling.
The show will feature displays and demonstrations on everything people will need for their projects, big and small, inside and out, from handiwork to home remodels – indoor living, landscaping, design, decorating, and more.
Vendors can sign up by filling out the registration form here and sending it with payment by Feb. 20 …
• Via email to marketing@saukvalley.com
• Via fax to 815-626-5365
• Or drop it off or mail it to Sauk Valley Media, 3200 E. Lincolnway, Sterling, IL, 61081.
Call 625-3600, ext. 5602, or email marketing@saukvalley.com for more information.
